meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a lion.
meanings.sent1: The leonine roar echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The majestic creature had a leonine mane.
meanings.sent3: The leonine statue in the park always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her leonine strength inspired those around her.
meanings.sent5: The leonine gaze of the lion captivated the audience.

meanings.sent1: The leonine family enjoyed basking in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper studied leonine behavior for years.
meanings.sent3: The leonine exhibit at the zoo was a favorite among visitors.
meanings.sent4: His leonine pride shone through in his every move.
meanings.sent5: The leonine symbol on the flag represented courage and strength.
